sentence.Network_en: Under Augustus, Rome's population grew to more than a million.
sentence.Network_cn: 在他的统治下, 罗马人口超过了100万.

sentence.Network_en: Augustus brought dignity to Rome's public life.
sentence.Network_cn: 奥古斯都致力于改善公众生活.

sentence.Network_en: Augustus instituted boards of curators to take charge of administrative tasks.
sentence.Network_cn: 奥古斯都曾设立保佐人委员会负责行政事务.
